<title level="1" right="Rules">[Tremors](/Rules.aspx?ID=2831)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 96 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Tremors knock creatures prone, causing them to fall or careen into other objects, which can deal bludgeoning damage appropriate to the severity of the quake.
</column>
